#summary modified partysip install guide

You need to install the p2psip lib and libssl-dev first. Then install the modified partysip as original one. 

For linux

install  p2psip lib:
  enter p2psip directory

  make

  make install

install partysip:

Usual compilation process:

  `cd' to the directory containing the package's source code

  ./configure --disable-debug --disable-trace

  make

  make install
